snippet: BODZIN--Annette G.,88. Preceded in death by her husband, Paul, and son, Robert, and survived by her daughters, Kate Scheinman and Wendy Kadens. May her memory be for a blessing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BODZIN--Annette G.,88. Preceded in death by her husband, Paul, and son, Robert, and survived by her daughters, Kate Scheinman and Wendy Kadens. May her memory be for a blessing. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BODZIN, ANNETTE G.
